body: Shit story great art.
not reading allat 🤣, anyways series was a clusterfuck never liked it from the start. Don't read it.

Yeah, this was a cluster fuck from the get go. Author had so many storylines and decided to salt the earth instead of wrap them up decently. Could have gone with childhood friend route but mf didn't.  Pretty unfortunate this had such a poor ending but it seems all parties were very unlikable in general. Mc was a cheating ass mf, childhood friend wasn't given a chance, mc gf was an insecure and picky, her best friend was a snake, so all in all this was bound for disaster. To top it off his new gf is sus as all hell so who even knows. Bottom line, go read something else if you want a better story. 4/10 sex scenes were decent but thats all there is to this.
what going on? i dont get anything, who dump who? who was cheating? its happy end or not and this short hair girl a cheating slut?

The GF was to insecure and wouldnt be open with her BF , The BF mistook it as her distancing herself from him(true but not the reason he thinks) he cheated as a way to cope/get over her..... in short communication did not exist
been waiting a loooong time to see more of ikuhanas work
I'm more of a clear cut happy end kinda guy or atleast 80% happy end, this malancolic shit ain't my cup of tea
Hmm so it can mean shes cheating on him and the cycle continues... what an end.
soo  finally TL'd but still confusing

So he never tried patching things up with his first gf and forcibly moved on, despite still not being able to let go. He did cheat on her with two different women, so that's a clear indicator that he wasn't that good of a guy to begin with, but maybe he did not try using the lost earring as an excuste for a final chance meetup because he felt like punishing himself/couldn't look her in the eye anymore, but then again, he states that he ran to the childhood friend a couple of times afterward, so who knows. Also also, I think the massive scar was supposed to represent insecurites/hesitation from opening up to someone after being burned (pun I guess intended) before, and how all that artificial distance made the guy drift to other women. It shows that both parties are to be blamed for the breakup, even though one clearly bears a way more heavy burden here. Regardless, now the story is finished and it feels good to know the ending after all these years.
All MC got is a big penis and he thinks with it, not his head.
Wow, there's such an idiot like this?
He's getting NTR'd but since he did it too he doesn't mind. I read somewhere that this is very common in Japan. The husbands cheat with prostitutes and the wives sleep with other people.
just because you did a mistake doesnt mean u shouldnt out yourself on doubting others this guy is actually fr an idiot

after 8 years, someone finally TL'd the last chapter.  thx. BTW, this idiot should have stuck with the older hotter neighbor chick who works at the office.  cant stand it when the guy is being NTR'd and doesnt know it..
so instead of going at it with motoko he got a new one huh

Y'all needa understand, the phone call is not meant to hint anything apart from how he has changed since his relationship with first girlfriend. What Nabana said before she left the room id a very normal phrase used in everyday life by JP people, but he can't help but consider the possibility of it being something else since he literally did it himself. Not saying shes 100% clean but the author left it up in the air on purpose because thats how it goes in real life. You can ruin everything by accusing her without anything concrete, or you can choose to believe in your girl and be better this time around.

@derplicious sorry, I thought she was Makoto LOL. I thought, after the friend text, he jump into her. I made assumption based on raw, sorry. yeah, Makoto is has that sly smile, but this one is different kind of smile

@etohno I dunno man, maybe I'm reading way into it, but their relationship is far from healthy, I think she's seeing someone else on the side, hinted from the phone call and him already suspecting something but doesn't confront her because he feels he has no right to do so.
I dont know why people said this is bad. from the start I always though this girl is the best for him, like the have rhythm that match for each other. I hope they keep this healthy relationship.
Its finally out , the legacy has ended
